official-title.#text:
To provide eligibility for veterans benefits for individuals who served in the United States
			 merchant marine in the Southeast Asia theater of operations during the
			 Vietnam Era.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Veterans benefits for merchant mariners who served during the Vietnam Era in the Southeast Asia
			 theater of operations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be considered to be active duty in determining the
			 individual’s eligibility for veterans benefits under all laws administered
			 by the

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the service of an eligible individual described in

quote.#tail: means an individual in the United States merchant marine who—

text.#text:
served as a crewmember of a vessel that was in oceangoing service during the Vietnam Era in the
			 Southeast Asia theater of operations; and
receives a certificate of honorable discharge under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall, upon application, issue a certificate of honorable discharge to an
			 individual in the United States merchant marine who served as a crewmember
			 of a vessel that was in oceangoing service during the Vietnam Era in the
			 Southeast Asia theater of operations who, as determined by the Secretary,
			 engaged in service of a nature and duration that warrants issuance of the
			 certificate.

, the Secretary shall apply the same standards relating to the nature
			 and duration of service that apply to the issuance of honorable discharges
			 under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 401(a)(1)(B) of the GI Bill Improvement Act of 1977

text.#text: In this Act, the following definitions apply:

quote.#tail:
means any citizen or resident alien of the United States serving as a civilian or civil service
			 member of the United States merchant marine.
quote.#text: individual in the United States merchant marine

header.#text: Individual in the United States merchant marine

text.#text:
the period beginning on February 28, 1961, and ending on May 7, 1975, in the case of an individual
			 in the United States merchant marine who served in the Republic of Vietnam
			 during that period; and
the period beginning on August 5, 1964, and ending on May 7, 1975, in all other cases.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall apply to an individual eligible for veterans benefits under

of such
			 section as if such section had been in effect as of the last date of the
			 individual’s service described in

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5112 IH: To provide eligibility for veterans benefits for individuals who served in the United States merchant marine in the Southeast Asia theater of operations during the Vietnam Era.
